Class EditOdpAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicAction
      • com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicConfirmAction
        • com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleAction
          • com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleDataGrid.UserAction
            • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.actions.EditOdpAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable

    public class EditOdpAction
extends com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleDataGrid.UserAction
    User action for editing an existing ODP (Ordine Di Pagamento - Payment Order) record.

    This action is triggered from the search results data grid and handles:

    • Retrieving the selected ODP ID from the grid
    • Setting up the OdpDetailForm in edit mode with the selected ODP
    • Navigating to the detail form for editing

    The action requires a row to be selected in the data grid (requiresSelected=true) and is identified by the OdpAppConstants.ACTION#EDIT_ODP constant.

    Author:
    RDS Software
    See Also:
    OdpDetailForm, OdpAppConstants.ACTION#EDIT_ODP

    • Method Detail

      • getNextStateID

        public String getNextStateID(boolean validated)
                      throws Exception
        Determines the next state after action execution.

        When validation passes:

        1. Retrieves the selected ODP ID from the grid selection
        2. Gets the detail form from the parent form
        3. Sets up the detail form in edit mode with the selected ODP ID
        4. Returns the detail form state ID for navigation
        Specified by:
        getNextStateID in class com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicAction
        Parameters:
        validated - true if validation passed (row was selected), false otherwise
        Returns:
        the detail form state ID if validated, null otherwise
        Throws:
        Exception - if form setup or state retrieval fails
        See Also:
        BusinessLogicAction.preXMapEntitiesDataInit(), BusinessLogicAction.execute(), BusinessLogicAction.doValidationLogic(com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.XMapEntitiesData)
